00039 #include "string.h" // for memset
00040 #include "dataMoveZtrsm.h"
00041 #include "defZC66.h"
00042 
00043 void arrangeDataUAZtrsm(doublecomplex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00044 {
00045   int cnt, diagCnt;
00046   int iValue, jValue;
00047   // zero out above diagonal
00048   if(kLoc < -mCnt)
00049   {
00050           return;
00051   }
00052   else if(kLoc < 0)
00053   {
00054         iValue = 0;
00055         jValue = kCnt+kLoc;
00056         diagCnt = mCnt+kLoc;
00057   }
00058   else if(kLoc < kCnt-mCnt)
00059   {
00060         iValue = 0;
00061         jValue = kCnt-mCnt-kLoc;
00062         diagCnt = mCnt;
00063   }
00064   else if(kLoc < kCnt)
00065   {
00066         iValue = kCnt-kLoc-mCnt;
00067         jValue = 0;
00068         diagCnt = mCnt-iValue;
00069   }
00070   else
00071   {
00072         return;
00073   }
00074 
00075   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00076   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00077   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_Z)
00078   {
00079     if(flagDiagisU)
00080     {
00081           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].r = (double) 1.0;
00082           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].i = (double) 0.0;
00083         }
00084         else
00085         {
00086           double ar, ai, av;
00087       ar = ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].r;
00088       ai = ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].i;
00089           av = (ar*ar+ai*ai);
00090           av = ((double) 1.0)/av;
00091           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].r = av * ar;
00092           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].i = -av * ai;
00093         }
00094   }
00095   return;
00096 }
00097 
00098 void arrangeDataLTAZtrsm(doublecomplex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00099 {
00100   int cnt, diagCnt;
00101   int iValue, jValue;
00102   // zero out above diagonal
00103   if(kLoc < -mCnt)
00104   {
00105           return;
00106   }
00107   else if(kLoc < 0)
00108   {
00109         iValue = 0;
00110         jValue = kCnt+kLoc;
00111         diagCnt = mCnt+kLoc;
00112   }
00113   else if(kLoc < kCnt-mCnt)
00114   {
00115         iValue = 0;
00116         jValue = kCnt-mCnt-kLoc;
00117         diagCnt = mCnt;
00118   }
00119   else if(kLoc < kCnt)
00120   {
00121         iValue = kCnt-kLoc-mCnt;
00122         jValue = 0;
00123         diagCnt = mCnt-iValue;
00124   }
00125   else
00126   {
00127         return;
00128   }
00129 
00130   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00131   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00132   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_Z)
00133   {
00134     if(flagDiagisU)
00135     {
00136           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].r = (double) 1.0;
00137           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].i = (double) 0.0;
00138         }
00139         else
00140         {
00141           double ar, ai, av;
00142       ar = ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].r;
00143       ai = ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].i;
00144           av = (ar*ar+ai*ai);
00145           av = ((double) 1.0)/av;
00146           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].r = av * ar;
00147           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].i = -av * ai;
00148         }
00149   }
00150   return;
00151 }
00152 
00153 void arrangeDataLAZtrsm(doublecomplex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00154 {
00155   int cnt, diagCnt;
00156   int iValue, jValue;
00157   // zero out below diagonal
00158   if(kLoc <= 0)
00159   {
00160           return;
00161   }
00162   else if(kLoc <= mCnt)
00163   {
00164         iValue = 0;
00165         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00166         diagCnt = kLoc;
00167   }
00168   else if(kLoc <= kCnt)
00169   {
00170         iValue = 0;
00171         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00172         diagCnt = mCnt;
00173   }
00174   else if(kLoc <= kCnt+mCnt)
00175   {
00176         iValue = kLoc-kCnt;
00177         jValue = 0;
00178         diagCnt = kCnt+mCnt-kLoc;
00179   }
00180   else
00181   {
00182         return;
00183   }
00184 
00185   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00186   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00187   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_Z)
00188   {
00189     if(flagDiagisU)
00190     {
00191           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].r = (double) 1.0;
00192           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].i = (double) 0.0;
00193         }
00194         else
00195         {
00196           double ar, ai, av;
00197       ar = ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].r;
00198       ai = ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].i;
00199           av = (ar*ar+ai*ai);
00200           av = ((double) 1.0)/av;
00201           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].r = av * ar;
00202           ptrA[(jValue+cnt)*MPARTITION_Z+iValue+cnt].i = -av * ai;
00203         }
00204   }
00205   return;
00206 }

00208 void arrangeDataUTAZtrsm(doublecomplex * restrict ptrA, int kLoc, int mCnt, int kCnt, int flagDiagisU)
00209 {
00210   int cnt, diagCnt;
00211   int iValue, jValue;
00212   // zero out below diagonal
00213   if(kLoc <= 0)
00214   {
00215           return;
00216   }
00217   else if(kLoc <= mCnt)
00218   {
00219         iValue = 0;
00220         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00221         diagCnt = kLoc;
00222   }
00223   else if(kLoc <= kCnt)
00224   {
00225         iValue = 0;
00226         jValue = kCnt-kLoc;
00227         diagCnt = mCnt;
00228   }
00229   else if(kLoc <= kCnt+mCnt)
00230   {
00231         iValue = kLoc-kCnt;
00232         jValue = 0;
00233         diagCnt = kCnt+mCnt-kLoc;
00234   }
00235   else
00236   {
00237         return;
00238   }
00239 
00240   if(jValue < 0) jValue = 0;
00241   if(iValue < 0) iValue = 0;
00242   for(cnt=0;cnt<diagCnt;cnt+=M_KERNEL_Z)
00243   {
00244     if(flagDiagisU)
00245     {
00246           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].r = (double) 1.0;
00247           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].i = (double) 0.0;
00248         }
00249         else
00250         {
00251           double ar, ai, av;
00252       ar = ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].r;
00253       ai = ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].i;
00254           av = (ar*ar+ai*ai);
00255           av = ((double) 1.0)/av;
00256           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].r = av * ar;
00257           ptrA[(iValue+cnt)*KPARTITION_Z+jValue+cnt].i = -av * ai;
00258         }
00259   }
00260   return;
00261 }
